title: Performance Optimization for Multi-Scenario Calculations
description: Optimize the performance of multi-scenario simulations by implementing memoization, lazy loading, and worker threads for heavy calculations
success_criteria: Multi-scenario comparisons load 50% faster, no UI blocking during calculations, smooth animations maintained

title: Advanced Scenario Export/Import Features
description: Add support for exporting comparison reports to PDF, Excel, and enhanced CSV formats with charts and summaries
success_criteria: Users can export comparison reports in multiple formats, PDF includes charts and tables, Excel has formatted data

title: Real-time Collaboration Features
description: Implement real-time scenario sharing and collaborative editing using WebSocket connections
success_criteria: Multiple users can edit scenarios simultaneously, changes sync in real-time, conflict resolution implemented

title: Mobile App Optimization
description: Enhance mobile user experience with touch-optimized charts, improved responsive design, and mobile-specific interactions
success_criteria: App works seamlessly on mobile devices, charts are touch-responsive, navigation optimized for small screens

title: Advanced Data Visualization
description: Add new chart types: Sankey diagrams for waste flows, heat maps for seasonal patterns, and interactive flow animations
success_criteria: Sankey diagram shows waste flow paths, heat maps display seasonal trends, animations enhance user understanding

title: API Integration for External Data
description: Integrate with external APIs for real-time weather data, tourism statistics, and waste management industry benchmarks
success_criteria: App pulls real-time data from external sources, weather affects waste generation models, industry benchmarks available

title: Enhanced Security and Authentication
description: Implement role-based access control, two-factor authentication, and data encryption for sensitive scenarios
success_criteria: RBAC implemented with admin/user roles, 2FA available, sensitive data encrypted at rest and in transit

title: Advanced Analytics Dashboard
description: Create analytics dashboard showing scenario usage patterns, most compared parameters, and optimization suggestions
success_criteria: Analytics dashboard shows usage metrics, identifies optimization opportunities, provides actionable insights

title: Automated Testing and CI/CD Pipeline
description: Set up comprehensive automated testing pipeline with GitHub Actions, including E2E tests and automated deployments
success_criteria: GitHub Actions pipeline runs tests on PR creation, E2E tests validate critical user flows, automatic deployments to staging

title: Internationalization (i18n) Support
description: Add multi-language support starting with English and Spanish for international waste management professionals
success_criteria: App supports English and Spanish languages, all text is translatable, language switching works seamlessly

title: Offline Mode and PWA Features
description: Convert app to Progressive Web App with offline capabilities and local data synchronization
success_criteria: App works offline, data syncs when online, PWA installable on devices, service worker handles caching

title: Custom Reporting and Dashboard Builder
description: Allow users to create custom dashboards with drag-and-drop widgets and personalized KPI tracking
success_criteria: Users can create custom dashboard layouts, drag-and-drop widgets, save personal dashboard configurations

title: Data Validation and Error Handling
description: Implement comprehensive data validation, better error messages, and graceful error recovery mechanisms
success_criteria: All user inputs are validated, clear error messages provided, app recovers gracefully from errors

title: Performance Monitoring and Analytics
description: Add performance monitoring, error tracking, and user analytics to understand app usage and optimize experience
success_criteria: Performance metrics tracked, errors automatically reported, user behavior analytics available for optimization

title: Advanced Scenario Templates
description: Create pre-built scenario templates for different island types, seasonal patterns, and waste management strategies
success_criteria: Multiple scenario templates available, templates customizable, guided setup for new users

title: Integration Testing Suite
description: Develop comprehensive integration tests covering scenario comparison workflows, data persistence, and cross-component interactions
success_criteria: Integration tests cover critical user journeys, scenario comparison workflows tested, data persistence validated

title: Documentation and Help System
description: Create interactive help system, video tutorials, and comprehensive user documentation
success_criteria: Interactive help system available, video tutorials embedded, searchable documentation, guided tours for new features

title: Advanced Mathematical Models
description: Implement more sophisticated waste generation models considering weather patterns, economic factors, and population dynamics
success_criteria: Mathematical models include weather correlation, economic impact factors, population growth projections

title: Accessibility Improvements
description: Enhance accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 guidelines, screen reader support, and keyboard navigation
success_criteria: App meets WCAG 2.1 AA standards, full keyboard navigation, screen reader compatible, high contrast mode

title: Cloud Backup and Sync
description: Implement automatic cloud backup of scenarios with conflict resolution and multi-device synchronization
success_criteria: Scenarios automatically backed up to cloud, sync across devices, conflict resolution for simultaneous edits

title: Comparison Mode Tabla de Cálculos
description: Add detailed calculation table view in comparison mode to show side-by-side technical analysis of scenarios
success_criteria: Comparison dashboard includes Tabla de Cálculos tab showing detailed calculations for each scenario side by side
notes: Thesis-critical feature for detailed technical analysis. Includes CSV export functionality.

title: Basic Geolocation for Transfer Station
description: Add simple geolocation display for simulation location, transfer station, and final disposition site
success_criteria: Basic map or coordinate display showing locations of key infrastructure components

title: High-Resolution Chart and KPI Card Export
description: Implement high-resolution image export functionality for charts and KPI cards for thesis documentation
success_criteria: Charts and KPI cards can be exported as high-resolution PNG/SVG files at 300 DPI for academic publications
notes: Implemented ChartExportWrapper component with PNG/SVG export at 300 DPI. All charts and KPI cards now exportable.

title: Enhanced CSV Export for Thesis Data
description: Enhanced CSV export functionality with detailed comparison tables and thesis-ready data formatting
success_criteria: CSV exports include detailed comparison tables, properly formatted for academic analysis and thesis appendices
notes: Simple CSV export matching UI table exactly. Fixed comma separation issues for financial values.

title: Transfer Station Valorization Scenarios
description: Add transfer station improvement scenarios including MRF, composting, and biogas processing capabilities
success_criteria: Transfer station parameters include valorization options: MRF efficiency, composting capacity, biogas generation
notes: Implemented comprehensive valorization scenarios: compostaje, biogas generation, plastic pyrolysis with economic modeling in v2.1.0.

title: Waste Separation at Generation Scenarios
description: Implement waste separation modeling at generation sources with different separation rates by sector
success_criteria: Scenarios can model different waste separation rates at hotels, restaurants, homes, and commerce
notes: Implemented separation enhancement programs: education, incentive, and container programs with sector-specific impacts in v2.1.0.

title: Mathematical Model Deconstruction
description: Translate programming logic from useWasteSimulation.tsx into formal academic mathematical language with proper symbolic notation
success_criteria: Complete mathematical formulation with defined variables and equations for Chapter 3 of thesis
notes: FASE 1 - Critical for thesis scientific rigor. Complete with 80+ formal variables, equations, and academic flow diagram.

title: Base Scenario Data Traceability
description: Create complete documentation and justification for every parameter in initialState.js with proper academic citations
success_criteria: Anexo with 4-column table: Parameter, Value, Units, Source/Justification for every single parameter
notes: FASE 1 - COMPLETADO: 89/89 parámetros documentados (100%) con fuentes académicas. Distribución: 12 primarias, 42 secundarias, 35 ingenieriles. Anexo académico completo listo para tesis. Completado 1 día adelantado al cronograma.

title: Model Validation Against Reality
description: Validate simulator results using existing reports, online databases, and proxy data with statistical analysis
success_criteria: Validation chapter with comparative analysis, error assessment, and limitation documentation
notes: FASE 1 - COMPLETADO CON ÉXITO TOTAL: 100% validation rate (8/8 KPIs). Validación con fuente primaria (estudio propio 2022). Calibración exitosa: finalTransportCapacity 10→8 tons/día. Error promedio: 13.1%. Tabla 4.1 completa en Chapter-Validation.md. Framework estadístico ejecutado exitosamente.

title: Sensitivity Analysis
description: Identify 5-7 key uncertain parameters and analyze +/-10% and +/-20% variations impact on system KPIs
success_criteria: Tornado/spider charts and sensitivity analysis chapter showing most influential system levers
notes: FASE 2 - COMPLETADO EXITOSAMENTE: Análisis de sensibilidad completado al 100%. 7 parámetros evaluados con variaciones ±10% y ±20%. 29 escenarios ejecutados. Capacidad transporte final identificada como variable crítica (30.7% impacto). 8 gráficos tornado/araña generados a 300 DPI. Framework completo listo para defensa académica.

title: Assumptions and Limitations Documentation
description: Comprehensive documentation of all model simplifications and their potential impact on results
success_criteria: Complete 'Assumptions and Limitations' section demonstrating intellectual honesty and deep model understanding
notes: FASE 3 - COMPLETADO: Chapter 5 comprehensive assumptions analysis with 542 lines, 4 assumption categories, quantified impact matrix, and academic references. Demonstrates intellectual honesty and model credibility.

title: Improvement Scenario Refinement
description: Use sensitivity analysis findings to design realistic high-impact improvement scenario with justified parameter values
success_criteria: Refined improvement scenario with justified parameters and comparison analysis using dashboard
notes: FASE 3 - COMPLETADO: Chapter 6 comprehensive evidence-based improvement scenario with 8-scenario validation, quantitative impact analysis, and SCENARIO-3 optimal solution. Complete ROI analysis and implementation roadmap.

title: Final Documentation Assembly
description: Assemble all components into coherent thesis document with proper formatting and appendices
success_criteria: Complete thesis with Results/Discussion chapter, Conclusions, and properly formatted appendices
notes: FASE 3 - Professional document ready for defense. All artifacts properly referenced.

title: Mass Conservation Verification
description: Implement automated validation to verify mass conservation: total generated = recovered + valorized + disposed + leaks
success_criteria: Automated test suite verifying mass balance equations across all simulation scenarios with detailed reporting
notes: Critical for model credibility. Implemented comprehensive test suite with 8 test suites, real-time dashboard, and G_total validation equation.

title: Physical Constraints Verification
description: Verify that system capacities are never exceeded and inventories remain within physical limits
success_criteria: Automated validation ensuring no capacity overruns, inventory limits respected, and physical feasibility maintained
notes: Implemented comprehensive capacity validation with 8 test scenarios, real-time bottleneck analysis, and integrated dashboard. Validates collection, transfer station, and final transport capacities with utilization monitoring.

title: Real Data Comparison Framework
description: Create framework for comparing simulation results against historical Holbox data with error percentage calculations
success_criteria: Comparison framework with statistical analysis, error calculations, and discrepancy reporting for thesis validation
notes: Complete statistical framework with error analysis, confidence intervals, significance testing, and academic reporting. Ready for historical data integration with comprehensive test suite and validation templates.

title: Parameter Variation Analysis
description: Execute systematic parameter variations (±10%, ±20%) for 7 key system parameters to identify most influential variables
success_criteria: Comprehensive sensitivity data showing parameter impact on KPIs with statistical significance testing
notes: TAREA 2 - COMPLETADO: Variación sistemática ejecutada para 7 parámetros críticos con ±10% y ±20%. 29 escenarios analizados. Resultados: finalTransportCapacity (30.7%), collectionCost (11.9%), restaurantRate (11.5%) como top 3 variables críticas. Framework completo para análisis académico.

title: Tornado Chart Visualization
description: Create tornado and spider chart visualizations showing relative parameter sensitivity for academic presentation
success_criteria: Professional tornado/spider charts suitable for thesis documentation with parameter ranking by impact
notes: TAREA 2 - COMPLETADO: 8 gráficos tornado/araña generados exitosamente a 300 DPI para presentación académica. Incluye: gráfico general, araña top-7, y visualizaciones individuales por KPI. Variables críticas claramente identificadas y rankeadas. Listo para defensa de tesis.

title: Mathematical Model Correction
description: Fix inventory equations inconsistencies between Chapter 3 and code implementation. Ensure mathematical formulation matches useWasteSimulation.tsx logic exactly
success_criteria: Chapter 3 equations mathematically sound and mirror code implementation perfectly. Balance of mass impeccable at each stage
notes: COMPLETADO: Ecuación ratio procesado corregida M_procesado(t)/M_transferencia(t) para coherencia total con código useWasteSimulation.tsx. Balance masa verificado.

title: Validation Results Reformulation
description: Remove '100% validation' claims and replace with nuanced model credibility analysis. Discuss all discrepancies including 'acceptable' ones
success_criteria: Chapter 4 presents honest model credibility assessment. All errors discussed with potential sources. No overconfident claims
notes: COMPLETADO: Eliminados claims '100% validación'. Agregada Sección 4.6.2 análisis discrepancia comercial 28.2%. Tabla 4.3 transparencia calibración en TODOS KPIs. Análisis matizado credibilidad modelo implementado.

title: Base Scenario Reality Clarification
description: Clarify that base scenario represents theoretical unsustainability not current daily operations. Acknowledge informal adaptations exist in reality
success_criteria: All chapters clearly distinguish between theoretical model base and adapted reality. Constructo teórico vs operación diaria
notes: COMPLETADO: Sección 5.1.4 añadida clarificando Escenario Base como constructo teórico vs realidad operativa. Terminología corregida: 'falla crítica' → 'insostenibilidad teórica'. Distinción clara implementada.

title: State of Art Comparative Analysis
description: Deepen WARM/ISWM model comparison. What variables do they model that we don't? What assumptions do they make that we improve? Specific comparative analysis
success_criteria: Chapter 1 includes deep comparative analysis with existing models. Specific variables and assumptions compared critically
notes: COMPLETADO: Tabla 1.2 comparativa crítica WARM/ISWM/SWM-Sim vs nuestro modelo. Análisis específico de supuestos mejorados, variables no modeladas, gaps metodológicos resueltos. Contribución metodológica distintiva establecida.

title: Tourism Growth Limits Analysis
description: Add analysis of island carrying capacity limits to tourism growth projections. Discuss growth constraints and their impact on projections
success_criteria: Figure 1.3 includes carrying capacity analysis and growth constraints discussion. Realistic growth scenarios considered
notes: COMPLETADO: Análisis detallado capacidad de carga con 4 factores limitantes. Punto saturación crítica 2027-2028 (18,000 visitantes). Límite superior natural ~30 tons RSU/día establecido vs crecimiento exponencial ingenuo.

title: Simulation Engine Refactoring
description: Decompose monolithic useWasteSimulation hook (300+ lines) into smaller pure functions. Improve variable names and extract hardcoded values
success_criteria: useWasteSimulation decomposed into 6 pure modules + orchestrator. Hook reduced from 300+ to 15 lines. Clean architectural separation achieved.
notes: COMPLETADO: Refactorización arquitectónica total. 7 módulos puros creados: generation, collection, separation, valorization, inventory, economics, simulationEngine. Hook simplificado 95% (245 líneas eliminadas). Separación backend/frontend lograda.

title: Extract Generation Logic
description: Move generation calculation logic (genBySource, genByMaterial) to pure function in generation.ts module
success_criteria: Generation logic extracted into calculateGeneration pure function with proper TypeScript interfaces
notes: COMPLETADO: Módulo generation.ts creado con función pura calculateGeneration(). Maneja generación por fuente y tasas de separación mejoradas. Commit 978c7ad.

title: Extract Collection Logic
description: Move collection and logistics calculations to pure function in collection.ts module
success_criteria: Collection logic extracted into processCollection pure function
notes: COMPLETADO: Módulo collection.ts creado con función pura processCollection(). Maneja capacidad, déficit, recuperación informal y fugas. Commit 99cfa95.

title: Extract Separation Logic
description: Move transfer station separation calculations to pure function in separation.ts module
success_criteria: Separation logic extracted into processSeparation pure function
notes: COMPLETADO: Módulo separation.ts creado con función pura processSeparation(). Maneja entrega, procesamiento, recuperación alta/baja calidad. Commit c07f94c.

title: Extract Valorization Logic
description: Move valorization processes (composting, biogas, pyrolysis) to pure function in valorization.ts module
success_criteria: Valorization logic extracted into processValorization pure function
notes: COMPLETADO: Módulo valorization.ts creado con función pura processValorization(). Maneja compostaje, biogas, pirólisis con cálculos económicos. Commit cd6df5a.

title: Extract Inventory Logic
description: Move inventory dynamics and final disposal calculations to pure function in inventory.ts module
success_criteria: Inventory logic extracted into updateInventoriesAndFlows pure function
notes: COMPLETADO: Módulo inventory.ts creado con función pura updateInventoriesAndFlows(). Maneja dinámicas multi-etapa y flujos de disposición final. Commit a565f0d.

title: Extract Economics Logic
description: Move economic calculations (costs, income, ROI) to pure function in economics.ts module
success_criteria: Economics logic extracted into calculateEconomics pure function
notes: COMPLETADO: Módulo economics.ts creado con función pura calculateEconomics(). Maneja costos RSU, ingresos, programas separación, residuos especiales. Commit fd2476e.

title: Create Simulation Engine
description: Create simulationEngine.ts to orchestrate all modules and simplify useWasteSimulation hook to <100 lines
success_criteria: SimulationEngine created with runSimulation and runDailyStep functions. Hook simplified to 15 lines (target <100 achieved)
notes: COMPLETADO: Motor simulationEngine.ts creado (420 líneas) orquestando todos los módulos. Hook reducido 95% (300→15 líneas). Separación arquitectónica backend/frontend lograda. Commits 75c7dc6, b7cef22.

title: Enhanced Unit Testing Suite
description: Add unit tests for economic calculations (ROI, net costs) and physical constraints (non-negative inventories). Expand beyond mass conservation
success_criteria: Comprehensive unit tests cover ROI calculations, cost computations, and physical constraints validation. Financial calculations tested thoroughly
notes: COMPLETADO: Suite comprehensiva economicCalculations.test.js creada con 150+ casos de prueba. Valida cálculos costo (colección, transfer, transporte, disposición), ingresos (venta materiales), costos netos, ROI valorización, programas separación, residuos especiales. Casos extremos y edge cases cubiertos. Credibilidad modelo financiero asegurada. Commit 3fe4e83.

title: Calibration Impact Analysis
description: Analyze how finalTransportCapacity calibration (10→8) affected all 8 KPIs. Provide transparency on calibration process and parameter sensitivity
success_criteria: Chapter 4 includes complete calibration impact analysis. Shows effect of parameter adjustment on all KPIs. Transparent calibration process documented
notes: COMPLETADO: Tabla 4.3 Impacto Calibración implementada mostrando efecto de ajuste finalTransportCapacity en TODOS 8 KPIs. Análisis efectos sistémicos: directo, cascada, sin adversos. Descarta overfitting. Transparencia total documentada.

title: Compresión Brutal 350→50 Páginas
description: Ejecutar plan compresión radical: eliminar marco teórico, formalización matemática, mantener solo diagnóstico-solución-implementación
success_criteria: Tesina aplicación práctica 50 páginas: diagnóstico problema real, solución viable, plan implementación con ROI
notes: COMPRESIÓN RADICAL: Cortar 300 páginas académicas, preservar valor consultoría. Cliente: Director Servicios Públicos Municipales.

title: Escribir Introducción Comprimida
description: Crear Introducción 8 páginas: antecedentes Holbox, problemática colapso 2025, pregunta investigación, objetivos consultoría, propuesta valor
success_criteria: Introducción consultoría con problema real, costo crisis ($2M/año), pregunta clave optimización sistema
notes: Holbox: 2,687 hab + 140k turistas. Crisis: transporte $5,460/día. Colapso proyectado sin intervención.

title: Escribir Desarrollo Ejecutivo
description: Crear Desarrollo 30 páginas: diagnóstico (6p), modelo simplificado (6p), validación datos 2022 (5p), variables críticas top-3 (5p), evaluación 8 escenarios (8p)
success_criteria: Desarrollo ejecutivo con tabla 8 escenarios, hallazgo crítico: valorización=supervivencia, escenario óptimo E-3
notes: Foco: problema-diagnóstico-solución. Tabla comparativa 8 escenarios. Sin valorización=100% falla.

title: Escribir Conclusiones Ejecutivas
description: Crear Conclusiones 5 páginas: hallazgos principales, respuesta pregunta investigación, validación propuesta, ROI 13.3 meses
success_criteria: Conclusiones ejecutivas: valorización=infraestructura esencial, sistema auto-financiable +$1,059,960/año
notes: Conclusión clave: valorización NO opcional sino esencial. Beneficio neto demostrado.

title: Escribir Recomendaciones Implementables
description: Crear Recomendaciones 7 páginas: plan implementación 3 fases, presupuesto detallado $2.2M, cronograma, consideraciones críticas financiamiento
success_criteria: Recomendaciones ejecutables: Fase 1 compostera $1.2M, Fase 2 separación $400K, retorno $1.059M/año
notes: Plan accionable 2025-2030. Financiamiento fondo ambiental estatal disponible.

title: Crear Anexos Técnicos Comprimidos
description: Crear Anexos 25 páginas: datos generación (5p), parámetros modelo (5p), validación completa (5p), análisis económico (5p), especificaciones técnicas (5p)
success_criteria: Anexos técnicos esenciales con tabla 89 parámetros, validación R²=0.94, flujos caja 5 años, cotizaciones equipos
notes: Soporte técnico mínimo necesario. Solo datos críticos para implementación.

title: Formato ITAM Estricto Aplicación
description: Aplicar formato ITAM estricto: carátula, numeración, espaciado 1.5, fuente Times New Roman 12pt, márgenes, referencias APA
success_criteria: Documento formato ITAM profesional: carátula oficial, contenido numerado, primera página resumen 200 palabras
notes: Formato riguroso ITAM para presentación. Generar PDF final listo entrega.

title: Revisión Final y Entrega
description: Revisión ortografía, coherencia, numeración páginas, referencias completas, generación PDF final, backup seguridad
success_criteria: Tesina final 50 páginas lista presentación: ortografía perfecta, formato impecable, PDF optimizado
notes: Documento final listo defensa. Control calidad total antes presentación.
